sqlMap.update: update sys_upload_file SET FILE_TYPE=#uploadFileType#, RESULT_TYPE = '0' where UPLOAD_ID = #uploadId# AND FILE_ID=#fileId#
update sys_upload_file SET DEL_FLAG='1' where UPLOAD_ID = #uploadId# AND FILE_ID=#fileId#
sqlMap.select:
select A.UPLOAD_ID as uploadId, A.FILE_ID as fileId, U.UNIT_NAME AS orgName, A.FILE_NAME as fileName, A.FILE_TYPE as fileType, ROUND(A.FILE_SIZE/1024,2) as fileSize, A.FILE_PATH as filePath, A.CREATE_TIME as uploadDate, A.CREATE_USER as staffId, S.STAFF_NAME as staffName, A.RESULT_TYPE as resultType, A.BUSINESS_DATE as businessDate, A.IMPORT_TYPE as importType from sys_upload_file A LEFT JOIN sys_staff S ON S.STAFF_ID=A.CREATE_USER
LEFT JOIN sys_unit U ON U.UNIT_ID=A.CREATE_ORG where A.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND A.FILE_TYPE IS NOT NULL A.FILE_NAME like CONCAT('%' ,#fileName#,'%' ) A.FILE_TYPE = #fileType# DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#beginDate#,'%Y-%m-%d') DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#endDate#,'%Y-%m-%d') A.CREATE_USER = #staffId# ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT A.* FROM $tableName$ A WHERE A.FILE_ID = #fileId# A.ERR_CODE = #isSuccess#
ORDER BY A.$inputHead.sortname$ $inputHead.sortorder$

SELECT f.UPLOAD_ID as uploadId, f.FILE_ID as fileId, f.FILE_NAME as fileName, f.FILE_TYPE as fileType, e.ERROR_ID as errorId, e.TOTAL_NUMBER as totalNumber, e.SUCCESS_NUMBER as successNumber, e.FAILURE_NUMBER as failureNumber FROM sys_upload_file_error e INNER JOIN sys_upload_file f on f.UPLOAD_ID = e.UPLOAD_ID WHERE e.UPLOAD_ID= #uploadId#

SELECT d.DETAIL_ID as detailId, d.ERROR_ID as errorId, d.ERROR_ROW as errorRow, d.ERROR_COLUMN as errorColumn, d.ERROR_MESSAGE as errorMessage FROM sys_upload_file_error_detail d INNER JOIN sys_upload_file_error e on d.ERROR_ID=e.ERROR_ID and e.UPLOAD_ID=#uploadId# order by d.ERROR_ROW,d.ERROR_COLUMN
select FILE_TYPE as fileType, TARGET_TABLE as targetTable, PROC_NAME as procName, SPEC_SERVICES as specServices, REMARK as remark from pub_imp_file where FILE_TYPE = #fileType#

SELECT MODEL_TYPE, INDEX_NO, TITLE_CNNAME, TITLE_NAME, IS_NOTEMPTY, IS_NUMBER, MUST_LEN, MAX_LEN, PK_FLAG, REMARK, ENUM_TYPE, VISIBLE, SPEC, FORMAT, DATA_TYPE FROM pub_model_upload T WHERE MODEL_TYPE = #value# ORDER BY INDEX_NO
select a.cust_no from cus_e_base_info a where a.cust_no = #value#
select t.unit_id from sys_unit t where t.unit_id = #value#
select t.acct_id from biz_dps_info t where t.acct_id = #value#
select t.org_prof from cus_e_base_info t where t.org_prof = #value#
select t.prd_code from pub_product_info t where t.prd_code = #value#
